snippet.title: Beast Dungeon Roguelike - March 2024 New Look and Gameplay
snippet.description:
Demonstrating the visual style and gameplay updates released in the March 2024 patch to the Beast Dungeon traditional roguelike top-down dungeon crawler RPG.

Beast Dungeon is available on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2466990/Beast_Dungeon/
